resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3154</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Board Games</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brettspiele</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jeux de Panneau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Jogos De Placa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Giochi del bordo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παιχνίδια πινάκων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Juegos De Tarjeta</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is aguideline for setting up simple game boards for different classroom activities.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">games</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist aguideline für einfache Spielbretter 
für unterschiedliche Klassenzimmeraktivitäten aufstellen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est aguideline pour les panneaux simples de jeu 
d'établissement pour différentes activités de salle de classe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este é aguideline para ajustar acima placas 
simples do jogo para atividades diferentes da sala de aula.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è aguideline per i bordi semplici del 
gioco di messa in opera per le attività differenti dell'aula.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι aguideline για τη σύσταση των απλών 
πινάκων παιχνιδιών για τις διαφορετικές δραστηριότητες τάξεων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Éste es aguideline para las tarjetas simples del 
juego de la creación para diversas actividades de la sala de clase.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiele</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">jeux</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">jogos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">giochi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παιχνίδια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">juegos</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <status>

            <value>final</value>
          </status>
          <contribute>

        <classification>

          <taxonPath>
